data.system_settings: Android Marshmallow 6.1, Samsung Galaxy J5 (2016) SM-J510FN.
data.actual_result: When you paste the link, Discord toll you "404: Not Found"
data.short_description: Invitation doesn't work if me use a link (like <https://discord.gg>)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to one server where you can create invite. - Share it (your invite shall follow this format: <<https://discord.gg/THE_CODE>>). - Click on the `+`, "Join the Server with an Invite Link". - Paste the link.
